directions: Mix the butter or margarine, instant pudding mix, eggs, and vanilla.  Stir well.  Mix in the flour, baking powder, milk, oats and chocolate chips.
Bake in 9 inch pan for 20 to 25 minutes at  350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Frost with chocolate icing.
ingredients: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant butterscotch pudding mix
title: Cloud Nine Butterscotch Squares
